QuestData.Title: Tormentor's Notes
QuestData.Description:
<The crumpled and singed page describes the Mawsworn's preferred methods of interrogation and subjugation.
Ve'nari may find it of interest.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Tormentor's Notes to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Quite the vivid description.
I suggest you consider this a reminder of what will happen should you fail in your efforts against the Jailer.
